g.text: Settlement Matrix in Central-Ledger - Refer to Reference Architecture: [https://miro.com/app/board/o9J_lJyA1TA=/]
1. Trigger Settlement Matrix - Central Ledger / Admin API
Fetch all batches that form part of the settlement criteria
of the settlement matrix request criteria
Publish Settlement Matrix Result for Liquidity Restoration
Create events for each Settlement Batch Account Balance update
